author: Jaykul
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
$InformationPreference = "Continue"
Write-Host "Hello World" -InformationAction Continue -InformationVariable drip

# BUG: No output here:
$host.UI.WriteInformation(($drip[0]))

# Works:
&{[CmdletBinding()]param() $PSCmdlet.WriteInformation($drip[0]) }

# Does not work:
&{[CmdletBinding()]param() $Host.UI.WriteInformation($drip[0] ) }

```

# Expected behavior

It should output the same as when I call `$PSCmdlet.WriteInformation`

# Actual behavior

It does nothing. Doesn't write it to the information stream at all

# Environment data

Fails to work the same way from PS5 to PS7
